release_notes: NEW: Variable tooltip copy button - Click to copy variable values with visual confirmation
NEW: Live URL â†” Params synchronization - Query parameters sync in real-time between URL and Params tab
NEW: Auto-refresh Variable Inspector - Panel updates automatically when scripts modify variables

IMPROVED: Request Details tab accuracy - Shows actual values sent to server after script execution
